# Learn about API authentication here: https://plot.ly/python/getting-started # Find your api_key here: https://plot.ly/settings/api import plotly.plotly as py from plotly.graph_objs import * fig = { 'data': [{'labels': ['Residential', 'Non-Residential', 'Utility'], 'values': [19, 26, 55], 'type': 'pie'}], 'layout': {'title': 'Forcasted 2014 U.S. PV Installations by Market Segment'} } url = py.plot(fig, validate=False, filename='Pie Chart Example')
